DES-3526.template:
config snmp system_name  {snmpTextField}
config snmp system_location {snmpTextField}


config ports 1-24 state disable

create account admin pavel
cvdYP78a
cvdYP78a

config time_zone operator + hour 3 min 0
config dst disable
config sntp primary 10.200.1.253 secondary 0.0.0.0
enable sntp

disable web

enable snmp traps

config pppoe circuit_id_insertion ports 1-26 state disable
config pppoe circuit_id_insertion ports 1-24 state enable
config pppoe circuit_id_insertion state enable

config traffic_segmentation 1-26 forward 26
config traffic_segmentation 26 forward 1-26

config stp ports 1-24 state disable
config loopdetect ports all state disable
config loopdetect ports 1-24 state enable
enable loopdetect

config vlan default delete 1-24

create vlan 150 tag 150
config vlan 150 add untag 1-24
config vlan 150 add tag 25-26

create vlan MGMT tag 1000
config vlan MGMT add tagged 25-26
config vlan MGMT advertisement disable

config traffic control 1-3 broadcast enable multicast enable threshold 64 action drop

config multicast port_filtering_mode all forward_unreg
config multicast port_filtering_mode 1-24 filter

config cpu_filter l3_control_pkt 1-26 all state disable
config cpu_filter l3_control_pkt 1-24 all state enable

disable cpu_interface_filtering

delete cpu access_profile profile_id 5
delete cpu access_profile profile_id 4
delete cpu access_profile profile_id 3
delete cpu access_profile profile_id 2
delete cpu access_profile profile_id 1

create cpu access_profile ip destination_ip_mask 224.0.0.0 profile_id 1
config cpu access_profile profile_id 1 add access_id 1 ip destination_ip 224.0.0.0 port 1-24 deny

enable cpu_interface_filtering

create access_profile ip tcp dst_port_mask 0xffff profile_id 2
config access_profile profile_id 2 add access_id auto ip tcp dst_port 135 port 1-24 deny
config access_profile profile_id 2 add access_id auto ip tcp dst_port 139 port 1-24 deny
config access_profile profile_id 2 add access_id auto ip tcp dst_port 445 port 1-24 deny
config access_profile profile_id 2 add access_id auto ip tcp dst_port 593 port 1-24 deny
config access_profile profile_id 2 add access_id auto ip tcp dst_port 2869 port 1-24 deny

create access_profile ip udp dst_port_mask 0xffff profile_id 3
config access_profile profile_id 3 add access_id auto ip udp dst_port 68 port 1-24 deny
config access_profile profile_id 3 add access_id auto ip udp dst_port 137 port 1-24 deny
config access_profile profile_id 3 add access_id auto ip udp dst_port 138 port 1-24 deny
config access_profile profile_id 3 add access_id auto ip udp dst_port 1900 port 1-24 deny
config access_profile profile_id 3 add access_id auto ip udp dst_port 5355 port 1-24 deny

create access_profile ethernet ethernet_type profile_id 4
config access_profile profile_id 4 add access_id auto ethernet ethernet_type 0x800 port 1-24 permit
config access_profile profile_id 4 add access_id auto ethernet ethernet_type 0x806 port 1-24 permit
config access_profile profile_id 4 add access_id auto ethernet ethernet_type 0x8864 port 1-24 permit

create access_profile ethernet source_mac 00-00-00-00-00-00 profile_id 5
config access_profile profile_id 5 add access_id auto ethernet source_mac 00-00-00-00-00-00 port 1-24 deny

config ipif System vlan MGMT ipaddress {ipTextField}/24 state enable
create iproute default 172.17.17.254 1

DES-3528.template:
config snmp system_name  {snmpTextField}
config snmp system_location {snmpTextField}


config ports 1-24 state disable

create account admin pavel
cvdYP78a
cvdYP78a


config time_zone operator + hour 3 min 0
config dst disable
config sntp primary 10.200.1.253 secondary 0.0.0.0
enable sntp


disable web
enable snmp
enable snmp traps

config pppoe circuit_id_insertion ports 1-28 state disable
config pppoe circuit_id_insertion ports 1-24 state enable
config pppoe circuit_id_insertion state enable

config traffic_segmentation 1-28 forward 26
config traffic_segmentation 26 forward 1-28

config stp ports 1-24 state disable
config loopdetect ports all state disable
config loopdetect ports 1-24 state enable
enable loopdetect


config vlan default delete 1-24

create vlan 150 tag 150
config vlan 150 add untag 1-24
config vlan 150 add tag 25-28

create vlan MGMT tag 1000
config vlan MGMT add tagged 25-28
config vlan MGMT advertisement disable

config traffic control 1-24 broadcast enable multicast enable threshold 64 action drop

config multicast port_filtering_mode all forward_unreg
config multicast port_filtering_mode 1-24 filter

config cpu_filter l3_control_pkt 1-28 all state disable
config cpu_filter l3_control_pkt 1-24 all state enable


disable cpu_interface_filtering

delete cpu access_profile profile_id 5
delete cpu access_profile profile_id 4
delete cpu access_profile profile_id 3
delete cpu access_profile profile_id 2
delete cpu access_profile profile_id 1

create cpu access_profile profile_id 1 ip destination_ip_mask 224.0.0.0
config cpu access_profile profile_id 1 add access_id 1 ip destination_ip 224.0.0.0 port 1-24 deny

enable cpu_interface_filtering


delete access_profile all

create access_profile ip tcp dst_port_mask 0xffff profile_id 1
config access_profile profile_id 1 add access_id auto ip tcp dst_port 135 port all deny
config access_profile profile_id 1 add access_id auto ip tcp dst_port 139 port all deny
config access_profile profile_id 1 add access_id auto ip tcp dst_port 445 port all deny
config access_profile profile_id 1 add access_id auto ip tcp dst_port 593 port all deny
config access_profile profile_id 1 add access_id auto ip tcp dst_port 2869 port all deny

create access_profile ip udp dst_port_mask 0xffff profile_id 2
config access_profile profile_id 2 add access_id auto ip udp dst_port 68 port 1-24 deny
config access_profile profile_id 2 add access_id auto ip udp dst_port 137 port all deny
config access_profile profile_id 2 add access_id auto ip udp dst_port 138 port all deny
config access_profile profile_id 2 add access_id auto ip udp dst_port 1900 port all deny
config access_profile profile_id 2 add access_id auto ip udp dst_port 5355 port all deny

create access_profile ethernet ethernet_type profile_id 3
config access_profile profile_id 3 add access_id auto ethernet ethernet_type 0x800 port all permit
config access_profile profile_id 3 add access_id auto ethernet ethernet_type 0x806 port all permit
config access_profile profile_id 3 add access_id auto ethernet ethernet_type 0x8863 port all permit
config access_profile profile_id 3 add access_id auto ethernet ethernet_type 0x8864 port all permit

create access_profile ethernet source_mac 00-00-00-00-00-00 profile_id 4
config access_profile profile_id 4 add access_id auto ethernet source_mac 00-00-00-00-00-00 port 1-24 deny

enable vlan_trunk
config vlan_trunk ports 25-28 state enable


config ipif System vlan MGMT ipaddress {ipTextField}/24 state enable
create iproute default 172.17.17.254 1
